Visit the ancient city of Babylon to witness the Hanging Gardens and learn about the culture and architecture of the Sumerians.
Go back in time to witness the construction of the Great Pyramid of Giza and learn about the engineering feats of the ancient Egyptians.
Attend a dinner party with Leonardo da Vinci to discuss his latest inventions and ideas on art, science, and engineering.
Visit the Library of Celsus in ancient Ephesus to explore the extensive collection of manuscripts and scrolls.
Attend a meeting with Marie Curie to discuss her groundbreaking research in radioactivity and the importance of women in science.
